Headline: #18 16th-18th Temporary Eastbound Reroute near Roosevelt/Michigan
ShortDescription: EB 18 16th-18th buses are temporarily rerouted via Roosevelt, State, 11th, Wabash & Roosevelt, due to street blockage near Roosevelt/Michigan.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #18 16th-18th buses are temporarily rerouted via Roosevelt, State, 11th, Wabash & Roosevelt, due to street blockage near Roosevelt/Michigan.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #9 Ashland Temporary Northbound Reroute near Ashland/Ravenswood
ShortDescription: NB 9 Ashland buses are temporarily rerouted via Ashland, Montrose, Ravenswood/Lawrence & Ashland, due to a festival near Ashland/Ravenswood.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #9 Ashland buses are temporarily rerouted via Ashland, Montrose, Ravenswood/Lawrence & Ashland, due to a festival near Ashland/Ravenswood.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #47 47th Temporary Reroute near 47th/Lasalle
ShortDescription: #47 buses temp. rerouted EB via 47th, Wentworth, 51st, Lasalle, and 47th; WB via 47th, Lasalle, 43rd, Wentworth and 47th, due to an accident near 47th Lasalle.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#47 47th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions, due to an accident near 47th Lasalle.

Eastbound buses will operate via 47th, Wentworth, 51st, and Lasalle, then resume their normal route on 47th.

Westbound  buses will operate via 47th, Lasalle, 43rd, and Wentworth, then resume their normal route on 47th.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #15 Jeffery Local Temporary Eastbound Reroute near 47th/Lasalle
ShortDescription: Eastbound #15 buses are temporarily rerouted via Lasalle, 43rd, Wentworth, and 47th due to, accident near 47th/Lasalle.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #15 15th Jeffery Local buses are temporarily rerouted via Lasalle, 43rd, Wentworth, and 47th, due to accident near 47th/Lasalle.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
